document_data.name: Kamal el Kitaeb
document_data.home: [[Calimport]]<ref group="note" name="home">Presumably, Kamal lived in and was the [[druzir]] of [[Yaraf Drudach]], where his shop, the [[Bards' Wisdom]], was located, but this is never stated definitively.
document_data.mainbody: '''Kamal el Kitaeb''' was a ''[[druzir]]'' of [[Calimport]],<ref group="note" name="home" /> the owner of a library, and a secret affiliate of the [[Harpers]].
document_data.Description: Kamal el Kitaeb was a half-elf [[mage]] and sage.
document_data.Possessions: Kamal owned a private lending library and consortium of sages called the [[Bards' Wisdom]] in [[Yaraf Drudach]] of [[Quill Ward]] in Calimport.
document_data.Activities:
As a ''[[druzir]]'', Kamal would have been officially responsible for the management of his ''[[drudach]]''.<ref name=EotSS-p66>

While operating the business of the Bards' Wisdom, Kamal also was secretly connected to the Harpers. He saw this as his actual calling; the operation of his business was just a front.
document_data.Relationships: Both Kamal's father and his grandfather had also had connections with the Harpers, and Kamal was happy to follow in their footsteps.
